mapper.sql: id, user_name, user_age, user_sex, user_address, user_card_number, telephone, hospital_id, branch_id, title_name, specialist_type_id, head_img, user_resume, user_strong, need_case_type, consultation_picture_price, consultation_video_price, create_time, create_user, update_time, delete_time, update_user, delete_user, del_flag

baseBranch.id baseBranchId,baseBranch.branch_name baseBranchName, -- childBranch.id childBranchId,childBranch.branch_name childBranchName, customBranch.id customBranchId,customBranch.custom_name customBranchName, userDetail.id udId,userDetail.user_name udName, userSign.approve_status usApproveStatus

LEFT JOIN base_branch childBranch ON childBranch.parent_id = baseBranch.id AND childBranch.del_flag = "0" LEFT JOIN custom_branch customBranch ON customBranch.branch_id = childBranch.id AND customBranch.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} AND customBranch.del_flag = "0" LEFT JOIN user_detail userDetail ON userDetail.branch_id = customBranch.id AND userDetail.del_flag = "0" LEFT JOIN user_sign userSign ON userSign.id = userDetail.id
mapper.select:
select
from base_branch baseBranch
WHERE baseBranch.parent_id is NULL AND baseBranch.del_flag = "0"

select ud.id ud_id, ud.user_name ud_name, ud.telephone ud_phone, ud.hospital_id ud_hospital, ud.branch_id ud_branch, ud.title_name ud_title, ud.specialist_type_id ud_sti, ud.user_strong ud_strong, ud.consultation_picture_price ud_cpp, ud.consultation_video_price ud_cvp, ua.user_phone ua_phone, us.signature us_st, us.doctor_card_front us_dcf, us.approve_status us_as, ut.case_type_id ut_cyi from user_detail ud left join user_account ua on ud.id = ua.id left join user_sign us on ud.id = us.id left join user_case_type ut on ud.id = ut.user_id where ud.id = #{userId}

select ud.id id , ud.user_name user_name, ud.telephone telephone, ud.hospital_id hospital_id, ud.branch_id branch_id, ud.title_name title_name, ud.specialist_type_id specialist_type_id, ud.user_strong user_strong, ud.need_case_type need_case_type, ud.consultation_picture_price consultation_picture_price, ud.consultation_video_price consultation_video_price, us.approve_status us_as from user_detail ud left join user_sign us on us.id = ud.id where ud.del_flag = "0" AND ud.branch_id = #{branchId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_detail (id, user_name, user_age, user_sex, user_address, user_card_number, telephone, hospital_id, branch_id, title_name, specialist_type_id, head_img, user_resume, user_strong, need_case_type, consultation_picture_price, consultation_video_price, create_time, create_user, update_time, delete_time, update_user, delete_user, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialistTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStrong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needCaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consultationPicturePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consultationVideoPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
user_name,
user_age,
user_sex,
user_address,
user_card_number,

hospital_id,
branch_id,

update_user,
delete_user,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update user_detail
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_age = #{userAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_card_number = #{userCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title_name = #{titleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specialist_type_id = #{specialistTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_resume = #{userResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_strong = #{userStrong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_case_type = #{needCaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consultation_picture_price = #{consultationPicturePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consultation_video_price = #{consultationVideoPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_user = #{deleteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_detail set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_age = #{userAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_card_number = #{userCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_name = #{titleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specialist_type_id = #{specialistTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_resume = #{userResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_strong = #{userStrong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_case_type = #{needCaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultation_picture_price = #{consultationPicturePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultation_video_price = #{consultationVideoPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_user = #{deleteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: user.id userId, user.user_name userName, user.user_age userAge, user.user_sex userSex, user.user_address userAddress, user.user_card_number userCardNumber, user.telephone telephone, user.hospital_id hospitalId, user.branch_id branchId, user.title_name titleName, user.head_img headImg, user.user_resume userResume, user.user_strong userStrong, user.need_case_type needCaseType, user.consultation_picture_price consultation_picture_price, user.consultation_video_price consultation_video_price, hospital.hospital_name hospitalName, branch.custom_name branchName, st.specialist_name specialistTypeName
mapper.select:
select
from user_detail user LEFT JOIN base_hospital hospital ON hospital.id = user.hospital_id LEFT JOIN custom_branch branch ON branch.id = user.branch_id LEFT JOIN specialist_type st ON st.id = user.specialist_type_id where user.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
